properties.areaDesc: St. Joseph, MI; Berrien, MI; St. Joseph, IN; Cass, MI; La Porte, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 6:12AM EST until January 11 at 12:15PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a

* Flood Warning for Urban Areas and Small Streams in...
Northwestern St. Joseph County in north central Indiana...
La Porte County in northwestern Indiana...
Cass County in southwestern Michigan...
Northwestern St. Joseph County in southwestern Michigan...
Berrien County in southwestern Michigan...

* Until 1215 PM EST Saturday/1115 AM CST Saturday/.

* At 609 AM EST/509 AM CST/, Doppler radar and weather observations
indicate that one and one half to locally over two inches of rain
has fallen across portions of northwestern Indiana into far
southern Lower Michigan. While the rain may taper off some through
8 am EST, the potential for another round of heavier rainfall will
increase after 8 am. An additional half inch to locally as much as
an inch of rain will be possible. This will cause poor drainage
areas as well as creeks and streams to rise.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
South Bend, Mishawaka, Michigan City, La Porte, Niles, Benton
Harbor, St. Joseph, Dowagiac, Westville, Buchanan, Georgetown,
Trail Creek, Granger, Benton Heights, Fair Plain, Bridgman, New
Buffalo, New Carlisle, Berrien Springs and Cassopolis.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Please report flooding to your local law enforcement agency when you
can do so safely.
